text: janannalkk duritanubhavannalkku sesam nam anugraham anubhavikkanavasaram nalkiyal utane avar nam'mute pramanannalute karyattil kutantram kanikkunnu. parayuka: allahu ativegam tantram prayeagikkunnavanan. nam'mute dutanmar ninnal kaniccukeantirikkunna kutantrannalellam rekhappetuttivekkum; tircca
